00070 /* The __TFS__ macro is used to optionally expand to "<>" depending on the
00071  * compiler.  Some compilers require it to indicate that the friend function
00072  * is a template function as specified in the standard, but others don't
00073  * like it so it will handled with a macro expansion that depends on the
00074  * compiler.
00075  */
00076 #define __TFS__ <>
